indexDesc: Here you can perform on-chain operations related to the MoonDAO community.
indexCard:
Lock your $MOONEY to obtain $vMOONEY and help govern MoonDAO.
$vMOONEY is required to vote on MoonDAO proposals through Snapshot.
lockTitle: $vMOONEY enables governance for MoonDAO through Snapshot.
lockDesc: You will always have the same amount of $MOONEY, regardless of your lock. The amount of $vMOONEY, and hence your voting power, decreases over time. To recharge your voting power you can visit this page to increase the time lock or add more $MOONEY to your time lock.
lockAmountDesc: This is the total amount you are locking, including the amount already locked.
lockAmountNote: ** Note, both lock amount and expiration date cannot be increased at once **
lockDesc2: Minimum one week, maximum four years from now. If you have already locked $MOONEY, you may only extend the lock time.
lockBalance: Your final balance will be approx
expDesc: Your previous lock has expired, you need to withdraw
safetyNote: For safety reasons, we recommend you limit your token allowance for vMOONEY to the amount you plan to deposit in the near future.
announcementsDesc: Here you can find the latest announcements from the MoonDAO team.
analyticsDesc: Here you can find the latest analytics for vMOONEY.
calendarDesc: Here you can find the event calendar for MoonDAO.
proposalsDesc: Here you can find the latest proposals at MoonDAO.
treasuryDesc: Here you can find the current balances and latest transactions of the MoonDAO treasury.
